description: Report export workflows that generate signed readouts for each use case, keep evidence accessible, and stream downloads via the REST API and CLI.
steps: Define report formats (JSON/CBOR) for default, complete, deep, and fast scans
Generate signed, time-limited artifact URLs stored in object storage
Expose API endpoints to query/download reports while requiring OAuth tokens
Integrate CLI report command to pull exports and store them locally
Add tests verifying report content matches the scan policy and includes CVE/CWE context
acceptance_criteria: Every scan run produces a report with severity/confidence and CVE/CWE references
Downloads require OAuth tokens and happen over HTTP/2+TLS1.3
Signed URLs expire within policy-defined windows
CLI can save reports locally via the API
